amendment.description: To require the Secretary of Homeland Security to create port security training and exercise programs for law enforcement and seaport personnel.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4939 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4939 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Kerry. (consideration: CR S9567-9574) To require the Secretary of Homeland Security to create port security training and exercise programs for law enforcement and seaport personnel.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4939 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4939 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Kerry.
